A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Give Rian Johnson some experimental side project set in the Starwars universe\, sure. But please make The Last Jedi non-canon. The film is spitting in the face of all life-long Starwars fans. GIve us a director who knows what he/she is doing. J.J. Abrams is good. Dave Filoni\, even better. Genndy Tartakovsky is fantastic. fix this mess. please.
